game.name: SeArena
game.categories: Single-player, Multi-player, PvP, Online PvP, Custom Volume Controls, Stereo Sound, Surround Sound, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Hoist the sails and prove who rules the waves! Pirate Arena is a fast-paced naval PvP brawler inspired by the chaotic fun of Sea of Thieves. One player becomes the Host, setting rules and map hazards, while rival captains trade broadsides, boarding actions, and daring maneuvers until only.
